description.value:
You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Crossbow]{Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Hand Crossbow]{Hand Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Speas}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Trident]{Tridents}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon azarketi weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial azarketi weapons are simple weapons and advanced azarketi weapons are martial weapons
